website_summaries.verdict: Not all cigar smokers need a large humidor, and this model with excellent workmanship is the perfect size for those who want to store 25 cigars or fewer.
pros: A sleek humidor with a cherry finish and solid build
Hygrometer makes it easy to monitor humidity levels
cons: Tends to drop humidity levels over time, requiring frequent seasoning

customer_reviews.title: Took a Chance  :-(
customer_reviews.text: The product matches the description, "Cherry Finish Spanish Cedar Humidor with Embedded Magnetic Seal" BUT As humidors go, this one is pretty much a dud. The hygrometer is junk and can't be calibrated and the 'embedded magnetic seal' doesn't really work well, as the humidity escapes through it. Very difficult to keep the humidity inside the box. I ended up putting this box inside a large zip lock bag to keep the humidity level at 70%. The material is simply too thin to absorb any moisture and keep it there. You get what you pay for...... Looks nice though. I think I'll just keep my cutters and matches in it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kazimierz S.

customer_reviews.title: Don't use the included humidifier(s), they are too unpredictable.
customer_reviews.text: The box is constructed well enough. I followed the seasoning instructions and when I checked on it after a while, the humidifier was molded over! My advice? Don't use a "dumb" humidifier...just buy Boveda packs. It takes the guesswork out of it. They also included a gel humidifier. I'm not going to use that either. Also, the hygrometer was WAY off. At least 10 percentage points. I still use it as a reference, I just did the salt test and marked where 75% was on the face of it. Make sure you remove the clear plastic ring from around the base of it.
customer_reviews.author: A. J.

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Closure
customer_reviews.text: This is no more than an expensive wooden box. There is no magnetic closure as advertised. Also, there is no description of the parts or instructions for assembly. The website provides general information but nothing specific regarding this unit. The idea that I would have to season this box for 2 weeks before use is ludicrous to me. The quality is a step up from the box containing my cigars so I'll use it for storage, but not as a humidor.
customer_reviews.author: catsthatquilt

customer_reviews.title: Humidor? Ah, NOPE! Cigar paraphernalia storage.
customer_reviews.text: I have made several attempts to season this humidor without success. I contacted company who reiterated seasoning process. I followed. Humidor will not maintain 65-70.%. I have two 60 gram Bovedas in it and it will not hold. Anyone who knows, knows that two 60 gram Bovedas should be WAY, WAY more than enough to keep the humidity at the desired percent. The humidity is leaking from somewhere, the seal does not keep it in. The box is very nice looking and maybe it's just a one off issue. I now use it top keep my lighters, fuel and cutters in - NOT cigars.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Stirling

customer_reviews.title: A great purchase and very accurate hygrometer
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well designed and crafted humidor. You can immediately feel the craftsmanship out of the box. Very impressive. As far as the hygrometer goes, there are countless articles on how inaccurate the analog ones are. So I tested the one that came with the humidor in both “salt and water in a zip lock” test and in with a Boveda pack. 75% on the first and 63% with a 62% Boveda pack. Maybe I’m lucky or maybe this brand makes very accurate hygrometer. Either way, I wouldn’t really sweat about the hygrometer. Test it out but in my case, it’s highly accurate. Also both humidifiers that came with the humidor work really well. Overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nariman

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars all around
customer_reviews.text: Got this for myself as a gift. Set up hygrometer and seems accurate after following directions. Holds humidity well, even in dry winter. Sometimes too humid during rainy summer weeks, and I often keep a Boveda pack in there with the humidity gel cup dry in the humidor. Worth the price if you have a few good cigars to keep, but for the smoker who purchases one stick at a time may not be worthwhile.
customer_reviews.author: adam jacoby

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality wood- Starter Humidor
customer_reviews.text: The quality is nice and the humidity control is a separate piece- very handy. When it was shipped however, it had only a thin piece of flexible Styrofoam around it (almost like thick wrapping paper) and in a thinner cardboard box., taped shut. It wold be very easy to damage this with a sharp box opening tool. I expected it to be packaged inside Styrofoam and more protected.
customer_reviews.author: Juli Baumgartner

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My husband just became a cigar novice. He used to only smoke one occasionally with "the guys". I found this and gave it as a Fathers Day gift. He absolutely loves it! I do not understand the whole cigar process. I just know they have to be kept moist to stay fresh. This case is perfect for that. You can even look up instructional videos. This was a great buy and a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Clements

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: So im new to the humidor/ cigar thing, i did want to keep my cigars fresh as i dont smoke them everyday but the cigar shop is a ways from home so i buy in bulk. When this thing showed up i was blown away by how gorgeous the craftsmanship is, being a mechanic and carpenter the workmanship always stands out first and this thing is beautiful for way less than the quality is worth, so far its working perfect and im able to keep the humidity regulated easily.
customer_reviews.author: JERIMEE BLACKETER

customer_reviews.title: Looks and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This would make a great gift! The box has a classic look and feel, it is made of cedar and therefore the inside smells exceptionally wonderful. The hydrometer that comes with it is analog and highly suspect. It’s better if you buy a digital one if you want accuracy. Also, you’ll need to season it 3-4 times before using it. I bought another humidity generator for the box to help produce the humidity needed. One last thing, it’s capacity is limited. With a digital hydrometer and a 1 inch X 3 inch humidity generator, the box only holds about ~15 medium cigars. Nevertheless, I’d buy it again or get one for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: HarryBob

customer_reviews.title: Magnets?
customer_reviews.text: More or less as i expected. Exterior finish is fine--cedar seems nice. Hinges are nothing special--hope they hold up. My biggest question is the "magnetic closure" part. While it certainly seems to close securely, i'm skeptical of the supposed embedded magnetic closure. I'm not seeing it, and it doesn't feel as if there are magnets involved. The "tightness" of the closure seems to come from the lid fitting snugly down over the cedar liner. Overall, it seems a little pricey for a small wooden box.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Roperti

customer_reviews.title: Small box, will require weekly humidity check
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for a very light smoker who typically only buys singles or 5 packs. Seasoned nicely but won’t hold humidity longer than several days at a time no matter what you do. Humidifier and meter are trash.
customer_reviews.author: PhillyGirlInGA

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good but not very functional
customer_reviews.text: Good looking “body” but definitely a minimal seal. I knew the hygrometer would be garbage and that’s not a problem. This was seasoned properly but never sealed well enough to hold humidity. I keep a plastic bag of cigars in there with a boveda as that is the only way it even works. Oh well -it didn’t cost a a fortune and I’m not killing the manufacturer. To a degree you get what you pay for and I need to upgrade to better quality is all.
customer_reviews.author: HMiller

customer_reviews.title: Best humidor for the price
customer_reviews.text: As far as under thirty bucks goes, I don’t think you can get a better humidor and this one comes with awesome customer service, too! My only complaint is that it comes with the same cheap hygrometer you get with every other cheap humidor, but for the price it’s still hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: DevanJones

customer_reviews.title: Very nice intro humidor
customer_reviews.text: I don’t smoke cigars that often, but when I make random purchases like this, I do as much research as I do when I buy a car ;) Even when to my Davidoff cigar lounge and had them check it out. Simple product that does the job after being conditioned. Comes with everything you see in the pictures. And everything worked well for me. Stays at 68-73% all the time with little maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: M.R

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: Humidor is as described and well made hygrometer is cheap but they seem willing to up with a digital one . One I like is the customer service. I had mine for a week and I just purée a few cigars . With the gel pack I see u can fit like 10 to 15 cigars Sure will update this review and provide the extra star as tike goes by
customer_reviews.author: Latin Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Loving my cherry wood humidor
customer_reviews.text: I loved my order and if I ever need another one I would re-purchase what I already bought or even something bigger. I bought it from Case Elegance, and the people there are the bomb. They helped me set it up and checked in with me to make sure everything was okay. Love Case Elegance!!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda De Vaul-Payne

customer_reviews.title: Can't seem to season well
customer_reviews.text: I have soaked this box in water for days and still can't seem to keep the humidity in it. I watched the videos and such on youtube, calibrated the meter with salt water, applied water..again, again, again.. humidity still comes down. The included gel material that's supposed to keep moisture in there doesn't seem to be enough. Nor is wiping the insides with a damp cloth every 1-2 days.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Henley

customer_reviews.title: Overall great product
customer_reviews.text: The box is great quality and the customer service is even better, I had a problem with the magnetic sticky part that connected to the humidor, it kept coming unstuck and would end up face down on my box, I texted the number that was in the email that I got for purchasing the humidor, they got back to me fairly quickly and offered to send me a new sticky pad and solution free of charge! The customer service alone would make me want to buy another box when I’m ready to upgrade
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Nice desktop humidor,  upgrade from what's included though
customer_reviews.text: The humidor itself is very nice. The exterior looks a e good and it makes a decent seal to keep in humidity. I use this to store petite corona's and juniors for the wife. The hygrometer and foam humidifier are junk though. Its not accurate and the humidifier doesn't keep up. Do yourself a favor and buy a digital hygrometer as well as some Boveda packs. This set up will work much better than what is included.
customer_reviews.author: BCSquare

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great support
customer_reviews.text: This is a great humidor! Within 2 days it was at the perfect humidity. I conversed with the CEO about a couple of items; he responded immediately and answered my questions thoroughly. The cedar lining is surprising thicker than other humidors and holds moisture quite well. If you’re looking for a starter or you enjoy an occasional cigar, this is a great humidor.
customer_reviews.author: gesch

customer_reviews.title: Great value humidor
customer_reviews.text: Love this humidor. Spanish cedar smells amazing. Box has a nice finish. Make sure you access the vendor website. It has good instructions and actually very accurate (and honest) information about the product.
customer_reviews.author: ck

customer_reviews.title: Very nice piece
customer_reviews.text: Cherry finish done well. Instructions for setting the hygrometer were spot on, very helpful. Finally this was probably the most well packed item I have ever received from any vendor. The humidor was very well protected from damage from shifting around in the shipping box. Very attractive item that would fit in any decor.
customer_reviews.author: Sport98

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the cigar humidor. Looks amazing, has a quality seal, and the box seasons nicely and holds humidity to 70 very well. Extremely happy with this purchase. Would most definitely buy as a gift for a beginner cigar smoke that has 15 cigars on hand that they want to keep fresh for a long time. The customer service is also top notch. I accidentally started the seasoning process with filtered water, not distilled, and Michael was extremely helpful in saving the humidor and the cigars with the CE solution. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Sturm

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Kind of dissapointed. I was a little misleaded when it said up to 25 cigars and I can’t even close the lid with 20 cigars because the humidifier prevents it. The hygrometer will not go above 60 percent which wasn’t a big deal as I had another one already. It’s a decent box for a couple cigars but if you plan to fill it I would say max is actually around 15 sticks. If I could do it again I would spend the extra money and get a bigger humidor.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: As advertised, minor problem, major customer service
customer_reviews.text: The Humidifier is as advertised and very nice (especially for the money) The glass face had separated from the humidistat in shipping, a Sunday text got a quick reply and a replacement sent. Also a very interesting education session on the humidor's use. The web videos are also worth watching
customer_reviews.author: Scott Foster

customer_reviews.title: A good humidor for the price
customer_reviews.text: I am an occasional cigar smoker, but receive them in enough quantity that I need to preserve them. I used a make shift humidor along with some humidifier tubes for a while but it just didn't work. I received this as Christmas present (that I hand picked) and I am very pleased. It looks good on my desk and I have maintained a perfect level of humidity for my cigars. This comes highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Watchword

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this humidor it was nicer than I anticipated. A beautiful piece of wood. Its the perfect size for me, as I am not a huge cigar smoker. The videos of how to season the humidor and set up the humidity gauge were also very helpful. Great humidor at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: john klapouchy

customer_reviews.title: Broken Hygrometer needle
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited about this product, but upon opening it found the hygrometer needle rolling around in its case. From what I have gathered, other people have had the same problem. No contact info on Case Elegance’s website either. Now I have to go spend another $20 to buy a hygrometer that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This humidor has been wonderful. I have had cigars in it for almost two weeks and each time I add a few cigars, I add some humidor gel for the crystals that came with it. Quickly the humidor drops to 65% but within 24 hours the humidity is back up to 74-78% and it stays right around 75%. For the money I can’t say enough good about it. I only have the dial so I am not 100% sure if it’s accuracy but it is off to a wonderful start. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: tking

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this humidor for almost two months and it's great. It holds humidity at a constant 70%. The cherry finish is visually appealing as well. Great for a nice starter humidor for someone just starting to get into cigars. Seasoning the humidor was a breeze. The hygrometer comes already calibrated and is fairly accurate as far as analog hygrometers go. The humidifier works well with propylene glycol solution keeping it at 70% humidity for a few weeks before needing to be refilled. Honestly I was pleasantly suprised at the level of quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ross F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful humidor
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and effective humidor. My wife loves it for her minis and they definitely smoke better as stored in this humidor. It does take a while for the box to get up to the correct humidity level but easy to maintain after that. A very nice value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Howey

customer_reviews.title: Sexy AF
customer_reviews.text: This is the most beautiful box I have ever purchased. How they made something this beautiful and are able to sell it at a profit on Amazon is absolutely mind-boggling. This box should be no less than $100. I feel so baller when I pull this box off my shelf to get my delicious stogies. The most superb Chinese craftsmanship I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I had some cigars that needed reconstitution and I needed a new humidor. I followed the instructions for setting it up and waited several days. The cigars are doing much better and the hygrometer actually works too. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun Bloodsworth

customer_reviews.title: The Best Budget Humidor Available
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner humidor! I was skeptical at first because of past reviews. After seasoning, the humidor holds a good seal and the finish on it is silky and elegant. Every starter humidor or budget humidor I've ever had couldn't hold a seal. This one does, which is all that matters when you're storing cigars. I seasoned this with an 84% Boveda pack. The included hygrometer isn't very good, so I recommend swapping it out for a digital one. Now that it's seasoned, I keep maybe 15 cigars in there along with a couple of 69% Boveda packs. I'm really happy with this humidor!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cigar box
customer_reviews.text: Nice little cigar box. Simple construction is a nice intro humidor, holding a small selection of cigars. The box holds humidity well (+-2% RH over the course of a day as measured by my own digital hygrometer). The box material is a bit thin, but is well suited for the cost. The finish is a nice red hue. The included hygrometer seems to be consistently off by a few. It consistently registers 5% less RH than my digital hygro, but does change the same amount as the outside RH changes. I have not used the included humidifier as I personally prefer other humidity sources. For $30, it's a nice decorative way to store cigars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Nice humidor, no instructions
customer_reviews.text: Nice humidor, but it did not come with any paperwork or instructions. The humidity gauge already fell off the lid where I installed it like the product photo shows. The humidor itself is good quality and has a nice tight seal to keep the humidity in. The wood and finishes are good. Wish the instructions and humidity gauge and device where better.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Manseau

customer_reviews.title: Customer service is top notch
customer_reviews.text: This product and the support you get when you buy it, is a wonderful surprise. I got gifted Cuban cigars that were not cared for, and needed a good humidor to help get them in smoking moisture to enjoy. I was overwhelmed with the follow up and additional attention by this group. You can beat them! Great price, honest folks.
customer_reviews.author: REV DFJ

customer_reviews.title: Can't seem to get the humidity up.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this humidor for about three weeks and can't seem to get the humidity to the proper level. I have tried several times to calibrate the included analog hygrometer with little success. It is possible I don't know what I'm doing because this is the first humidor I've even owned. It's also possible that the analog hygrometer is so far off that I doubt my ability to calibrate it. I've tried the salt calibration and now I have a boveda 84% packet inside but I have never seen the humidity rise about 60%. I'm going to keep trying but so far I'm having trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first humidor and I really like it. It seems to be maintaining a proper humidity level and my cigars are staying moist and fresh. I would highly recommend this humidor for any first time cigar enthusiasts who need a good product to store your cigars in.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas H.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice humidor
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice cigar humidor for the money and is great for newcomers/beginning cigar smokers. The finish is attractive and looks great anywhere you put it. I am very pleased with my purchase, I added a digital hygrometer with a 69% Beveda pack, it's averaging 69%-70%. It's nice to have a cigar while playing a round of golf again, enjoy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: RMcWFlorida

customer_reviews.title: I followed the seasoning instructions (distilled water for about 5 days) and it seems to be working great and keeps my collection at an ideal humidity level
customer_reviews.text: New to the hobby of cigar smoking and I decided to purchase a humidor for my small collection. Unfortunately, when the humidor arrived, the hygrometer's glass was badly cracked. I emailed the seller and within three days they mailed me a replacement (with no hassle). I followed the seasoning instructions (distilled water for about 5 days) and it seems to be working great and keeps my collection at an ideal humidity level. It is small, so I wouldn't recommend this for anyone with a big collection, but it is perfect for me...
customer_reviews.author: Beantown617

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner's humidor package.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it's much better than other humidors offered at this price point. It comes with an analog hygrometer and a gel humidifier. The hygrometer stated it was pre-calibrated, but analogs are fickle and should always be checked. After doing the salt test, I had to calibrate my hygrometer up by 5. The seal has held a constant 70% for the past 24 hours and looks like it's ready to hold some cigars. The packaging and quality of the product shows that case Elegance really cares in providing an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Could be me
customer_reviews.text: Very nice design too bad it never gets to 75 or 80. I have to constantly add water for it work right. Must be something I’m doing wrong. It’s been 3 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Standard

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality, hygrometer is accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Case is as advertised. I bought the Boveda one step calibration kit and the hygrometer seems to be pretty accurate (unlike some of the other comments on here). Maybe it's just hit or miss. Either way, I bought a Caliber 4R so I'm going to use it. I will use the included hygrometer in my travel humidor. Overall, I am very pleased. Great quality for a casual cigar smoker like myself.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT L GARLAND

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Now bad for the money, not a very tight seal, the “magnetic seal” doesn’t do much to keep in humidity. I can clearly see a gap between the lid and box and they aren’t lined up correctly making the box slightly misaligned. Included hygrometer is garbage as is the humidifier. Nice cedar lining though and has a nice aroma. If it’s your first humidor do yourself a favor and get an acrylic one
customer_reviews.author: Nick F.

customer_reviews.title: I was initially very pleased with this humidor
customer_reviews.text: I was initially very pleased with this humidor. However, even after seasoning it throughly, I've had trouble keeping the humidity adequately regulated and it has been requiring 2 of the 84% boveda packs just took keep an RH of 66-72% which is remarkably surprising and frustrating for such a small humidor.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Paulsen

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful humidor.
customer_reviews.text: The craftsmanship is incredible. Seasoned with Boveda 84% the hygrometer is off by -6% and the humidifier is plastic and cheap looking, case Elegance should consider something that better matches the quality of the humidor. But the humidor itself is quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Gadacz

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for someone just getting into cigars or if you’re ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid humidor ! I was looking for a humidor that wasn’t too big or expensive. This is perfect for someone just getting into cigars or if you’re looking for a nice desk humidor. It took two days to season, and has held a consistent 66-70% rh. The only reason I didn’t put 5 stars is because I had to take the hydrometer apart to properly set the needle when calibrated. Besides that, it’s a beautiful box! The company that makes them has great customer service if you need help with anything.
customer_reviews.author: Paul g.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality in product and service!!!
customer_reviews.text: The product quality is above my expectations at a very affordable price. Once I seasoned my humidor, I held RH how it’s supposed to. The customer service is extraordinary and they are there for any questions or doubts you might have with the proper seasoning and use of the humidor
customer_reviews.author: Sixto Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Good humidor, needs quite a bit of seasoning though.
customer_reviews.text: It works great, holds a good section of cigars. However, I had to water season this humidor for 8 days to get it to read ~70%. Great box though, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: You get instructions for setup
customer_reviews.text: It came with everything to get started to care for your cigars and the craftmanship is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Richard W. Davis, Jr

customer_reviews.title: It semi - works, it is nothing spectacular and ...
customer_reviews.text: It semi - works, it is nothing spectacular and I will go a different route the next time however it doesn't seem to hold well. I put a few Broveda packs inside and cannot get the humidity to stay around 70 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Have to get the disc once a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Right for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Right size for me, finish is beautiful. This is exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.author: Jaime Vargas

customer_reviews.title: hygrometer might be Broken out of the BOX!!
customer_reviews.text: The humidor arrived on time per order & looks great.. BUT the hygrometer was BROKEN!!! Have sent an email to Case Elegance & will see what happens!! Will update later!!
customer_reviews.author: TC Mabray

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is very nice. My husband wanted one for the place we stay 4 months of the year, fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: nosie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Humidor for Beginners and Casual Smokers
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very simple but well built cherry humidor. The cedar inside smells fantastic. Make sure you check out their videos before buying so that you know how to season the humidor and also order the solution. They also have a very helpful video on how to calibrate your humidity gauge.
customer_reviews.author: aptjd

customer_reviews.title: Small travel humidor
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this one before I read the whole description. It is pretty small. Good for travel
customer_reviews.author: Dennis W. Black

customer_reviews.title: 4 Star
customer_reviews.text: The humidor was simple which was exactly what I wanted. However, the description stated that it came with a digital hygrometer when in fact it was analog. Also, the felt on the bottom of the humidor was bubbly so I will have to reglue it. Other than that everything else is good.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rodriquez

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome entry level humidor. Seasoned it according to the Case Elegance instructional video on their website and within two days it was ready for my cigars.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Is the meter wrong?
customer_reviews.text: Box fit is ok, finish is nice. I cannot seem to get humidity up to 80% stays at 50%, not sure if meter is wrong. They send two humidifier devices which is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Elegance for cigars
customer_reviews.text: Very well built looks good on my desk hold humidity pretty close to 70%. Holds 16-20 cigars
customer_reviews.author: river rat

customer_reviews.title: The best support
customer_reviews.text: Best Customer support! Had i issues with my humidor, the manufacturer, sent me an replacement and upgraded my hygrometer to digital unit!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark F. Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small humidor at great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great price. Great customer relations with advanced instructions.
customer_reviews.author: doctor j

customer_reviews.title: One Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and Excellent customer service. Thank y’all for going above and beyond for a small issue that I had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, well built humidor
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, well built humidor. Looks like much higher quality than the price would indicate. Holds 75% humidity extremely well. Would give it 5 stars if it had a little bevelled indentation to open with your fingers. Magnet seals great!
customer_reviews.author: R Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I was very new to cigars and cigar care. This product is perfect for aficionados and beginners. Customer service is very knowledgeable and will help you season your humidor. Very prompt response time and very professional. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Paisono48

customer_reviews.title: Great for Cigar Beginner
customer_reviews.text: I'm a newbie who received some nice cigars as a birthday gift. I wanted to store them well enough to enjoy them over time. This is a great looking humidor that seasoned nicely and is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking humidor.
customer_reviews.text: Elegant humidor and it's doing its job. I had a problem with the original hygrometer that came with it and reported that. I got a reply back immediately letting me know a replacement had been shipped -- which I received, and it works fine. Good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: G.E

customer_reviews.title: Great humidor for a beginer
customer_reviews.text: Humidor is great for a first timer. Its holding 70% humidity just after about a week of seasoning. Would definitely buy again from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Mike T

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up the humidor for % humidity and servicing the humidifier. Only negative, the humidor is so tight, which is desired, that it is a little hard to open. Perhaps, some sort of hardware on the lid would help. Excellent value for the dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Don K.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size. Very sleek looking
customer_reviews.text: Very sleek looking. Easy to set up. Packaged extremely well! No scratches. Husband has no complaints and is quite happy with makes me happy
customer_reviews.author: Chaille Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Humidor for the media room.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this box for my media room and I love it. Basic and easy to set up. Holds plenty of cigars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I did not know what to expect as this was the first humidor I have ever purchased. A pleasant surprise! The quality was great. I will be giving these as gifts to my cigar smoking friends.
customer_reviews.author: John Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Seems good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works ok, the hygrometer that came with it seems inaccurate. It is very nice looking and seems to be well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Gary H.

customer_reviews.title: Cherry finish cigar humidor
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful box with everything needed to regulate humidity in box.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory B.

customer_reviews.title: Solid value
customer_reviews.text: Great value and solid customer service. Great for cigar beginners like me looking for an inexpensive humidor for their sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter Humidor
customer_reviews.text: This is a great starter humidor. It does need some seasoning (like every humidor), but once I had it seasoned and filled with cigars it worked perfectly. I would recommend calibrating the hygrometer though, I tested it side by side with my top of the line hygrometer and it was about 10 points off, but it is adjustable so once that it done it should work great! Definitely recommend as a starting humidor, and would make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Sestito

customer_reviews.title: Possibly defective
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of months now great size smells good and seems pretty durable. My problem with it is it seems to not keep moisture , giving the fact I'm using the stock hydrometer it sits at 50 humidity after I seasoned twice !! But I have seen it at a perfect 70% before is it a user error ?
customer_reviews.author: john Espinosa

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and customer support.
customer_reviews.text: The case is well made and looks great. The customer service is also very good, as they offer tutorials on how to season the case and take care of it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: This case was exactly how it was described and really has a great quality and craftsmanship to it. I would highly recommend this product to anyone in the market looking for a nice and affordable humidor.
customer_reviews.author: James Mastronardi

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Small but great starter humidor. Nice cherry finish to the box.
customer_reviews.author: eeandee

customer_reviews.title: Good box for the money
customer_reviews.text: Box is nice but seems to be poorly constructed. There are lots of gaps in the wood , even after soaking the wood it was not tight . But with a little wood glue and some redneck ingenuity it’s works great now .
customer_reviews.author: Nathanael Coonts

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my humidor
customer_reviews.text: The instructions to prepare for the use of the humidor was very helpful. The only isuue I have is when trying to open the unit. You require to hold fast the bottom part while prying open the upper part. Other than that the humidor is keeping my Cuban cigars safe and fresh
customer_reviews.author: Todd B

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far has held the humidity with using just the puck. Just wish I got one a little larger, this will store 20 6" × 54.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: well crafted
customer_reviews.text: After seasoning the Humidor, I am very happy how it holds the humidity well. When I received the package, the Hygrometer was broke, I contacted the shipper and they sent me a digital one the same day at no cost. I would highly recommend this product to anyone wanting a smaller humidor!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Xmas for my boyfriend and he loves it. Very stylish decor. Wonderful cherrywood scent!
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Walker

customer_reviews.title: good humidor itself as described
customer_reviews.text: good humidor itself as described; humidity meter is not working properly - the company has not responded to my several emails in this regard; I had to buy a new meter separately
customer_reviews.author: alex 11

customer_reviews.title: Nice humidor
customer_reviews.text: Nice humidor. Spend the extra $ and get the digital.
customer_reviews.author: deez

customer_reviews.title: High quality at affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Great humidor. I bought one as a gift and I was very impressed with the quality for the price. Case elegance is an amazing company who stand by their product and I look forward to doing business with them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Wenger

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: It won’t hold humidity longer than few days at a time no matter what you do. I wish I can return it....
customer_reviews.author: David Kim

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Solid craftsmanship, beautiful product excellent customer service. Buy the water solution, it makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really great deal for the price. The company was attentive and included instructions on how to season the box and calibrate the included hygrometer, which were clear and easy to follow. No complaints with how they handled the entire process and the product functions as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great instructions
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were great and after 5 days the humidity was right where it needed to be an holding. My cigars are in a safe and happy place.
customer_reviews.author: James Devis

customer_reviews.title: Has a great outer casing but without any instruction on the inners ...
customer_reviews.text: Has a great outer casing but without any instruction on the inners and no complete seal, it’s more so for a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Travis L.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Product is beautiful and looks great on the bar! It opens and closes with ease and the videos they provided explained seasoning process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cigar box worth buying
customer_reviews.text: bought for my boss told me it wotks great for his cigars
customer_reviews.author: Music.N.ink

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband and noticed that it doesn't come with instructions on how to mount the thermostat. He also said that it never got to the right humidity. Still not sure what the problem is but he doesn't like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Davida Feliciano

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size humidor for a beginner, had a couple questions and Michael answered them immediately and helped me work out the beginner kinks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Cherry Finish Spanish Cedar Humidor with Magnet Seal and Humidifier Gel
feature_bullets: 🔥 The only MAGNETICALLY SEALED humidor creates an amazingly tight seal and easily passes the dollar bill test. This seal rivals that of much more expensive humidors and will keep your cigars fresh for ages longer than comparable humidors.
🔥 SPANISH CEDAR coaming and inlay makes this humidor a moisture holding machine. Keep those smokes just how you like them.
🔥 Storage for up to 25 CIGARS makes this the perfect humidor size for the beginner or intermediate cigar smoker.
🔥 The included HYGROMETER and HUMIDIFIER makes this humidor ready to go, simply place a small bowl of water in the humidor for up to 14 days to season it.
🔥 The only humidor that comes with case Elegance humidification gel that makes keeping the humidity regulated a snap. Be sure to watch for emails from the seller for specific seasoning instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
